params._allowedERC20Address: Poker Token contract address used to ensure that this will be the only token provider (for now)
params._turnBasedGameAddress: address of the TurnBasedGame contract used for starting games

params._gameMinFunds: minimum funds required to be staked in order to join the game
params._gameNumPlayers: number of players in the game
params._gameTemplateHash: template hash for the Cartesi Machine computation that verifies the game (identifies the game computation/logic)
params._gameValidators: addresses of the validator nodes that will run a Descartes verification should it be needed

returns._0: array of QueuedPlayer structs representing the currently enqueued players for the specified game

params._erc20Address: Address for a ERC20 compatible token provider
params._gameMinFunds: minimum funds required to be staked in order to join the game
params._gameNumPlayers: number of players in the game
params._gameTemplateHash: template hash for the Cartesi Machine computation that verifies the game (identifies the game computation/logic)
params._gameValidators: addresses of the validator nodes that will run a Descartes verification should it be needed
params._playerFunds: amount being staked by the player joining the game
params._playerInfo: game-specific information for the player joining the game

params._gameMinFunds: minimum funds required to be staked in order to join the game
params._playerAddress: address for the player whose tokens will be locked in lobby account

params._tokensToTransfer: Amount of tokens locked in lobby contract that will be transfered to game contract

getQueue(bytes32,bytes,address[],uint8,u.notice: Retrieves the current queue for a given game (specified by its template hash, metadata and number of players)

joinGame(bytes32,bytes,address[],uint8,u.notice: Allows a player to join a game. People are queued up as they join and the game starts when enough people are available.

lockFunds(address,address,uint256).notice: Lock player tokens in the lobby contract until the game start

transferTokensToGameAccount(address,uint.notice: Transfer players tokens locked in lobby contract to the game contract

userdoc.notice: Entry point for players to join games handled by the TurnBasedGame contract
